channel.title: A serious question,
channel.description: Well i'm making a PK based server and I was wandering how the people of MoparScape feel. I have skulls on my server based on the wealth of your armor and supplies, now they show up before you fight to show how much the person is sacrificing. Now what do you guys feel is better, the old 3 items not skulled, none skulled, 1 with protect 1 item. Or the new always skulled, protect 1 item, protect 1 item doesn't work?

item.title: A serious question,
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Your welcome.

Read full topic

item.title: A serious question,
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

Thanks for the suggestion, Dastan. Everything helps :).

Read full topic

item.title: A serious question,
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

I’d suggest doing that if a person has no skull and dies , he can only save 1 item with “protect item” prayer. And if he has the skull and dies, he could save 2 mediocre expensive items.

Read full topic
